page.title: 19LIFE IN DUNHAMPSTEAD.
page.content: {Dunhampstead}is a small village with two houses,one 0f which is of historical interest,a public house, a canal boat hiring centre,a souvenir shop and a level crossing. In the winter it is a quiet place with little to do,especially for the younger generation.In the summer there are a lot of tourists,who moor there.They may just stop for refreshments at{The Forge Studio}or they may go for a snack /restaurant meal at the{Firs Inn.}Here many teenagers are employed as part time staff.At the level crossing there is a small building from where the gates are operated. In our view older people would appreciate this area more because they enjoy the quietness of the countryside which Dunhampstead has to offer.
